properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sabata Masinao,
Andriamanitray,
No nitsaharanao,
Ka itsaharanay.
Sabata Masinao,
Ry Tompo tianay,
Izao anio izao
Ka ifalianay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Sabata Masinao,
Andriamanitray,
No nitsaharanao,
Ka itsaharanay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sabata Masinao,
Jehovah Tompo soa.
No voatahinao
Ka maminay tokoa.
Sabata Masinao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sabata Masinao,
Ry Ray malalanay,
Nohamasininao
Ka hamasininay.
Sabata Masinao, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sabata Masinao,
Ry Jeso Tomponay,
No tena andronao
Ka ivavahanay.
Sabata Masinao, sns.
